item.description:
Working on a website and need visual direction? Join a group of curious designers to brainstorm a process! This workshop is interactive. We will use virtual as well as physical resources, so come with ideas, questions and stuff to put on boards. We will explore choosing icons, color, font resourcing, achieving the elusive zeitgeist of creating a great web look with a sustainable or 'green' presence.
Suggested donation: $5 to cover the Media
Food available next door at the Woodstar cafe!

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Mood Board Workshop for Web Design-Session theme: Building a 'Greener' site
